name: Cinderella (Jamela)
description: The story of Cinderella is one of the famous fairy tales that resembles a narrative being magical and idealized. It holds high principles for proper conduct concerning kindness towards all, having the will to forgive others for doing wrong, and never letting negative things break your heart. The story contains countless of elements that holds people’s attention which makes it interesting. Apart from the story, the most interesting about the artifact is that users or players has the opportunity to read and interact with the content through the use of simple visual flowchart and creating hyperlinks between the passages. The narrative is able to move in a continuous stream, along with the process of the user and story working together and influencing each other which worked well. Regarding the appearance of the artifact, the design contains minimum amount of forms and avoids excess of decorative elements for the purpose of prioritizing the essential. Since Cinderella is graceful and stylish in both appearance and manner, pure form of elegance design is achieved through simplicity and objectivity with the use of white background which adds visual emphasis to other important parts of the artifact. With regards to the distinctive attributes or aspects that did not work, playing a specific sound whenever the user clicks a certain text is considered. In expressing of judgement on the basis of perceived faults and lack of suitable components, more systematic research and exploration should’ve been executed in order to establish fulfillment of user’s expectations and experience.
